resources.string: This is small independent shoe store.

This is a shoe store. We boast top quality shoes here. \n100% customer satisfaction guaranteed!!! We will refund 100% if you\'re not satisfied with our shoes. \nSee Refund policy at the back of our receipt for more details.

You can buy shoes from the independent shoe makers in this store. You can also request customizations for the shoe and we will confirm with the shoe maker and notify you. Customize your shoes at the best price value. \nClick begin to continue.
